JD-Table / Demo's

JD-Table can be configured in many ways, below is a number of demos available to show variable layouts and use cases.

Responsive

  • Default
  • Virtual Rendering (1,000 Rows)
  • Virtual Rendering (100,000 Rows)
  • Pagination Rendering (1,000 Rows)
  • Pagination Rendering (100,000 Rows)
  • Slim (Just Table Data)

Fixed

  • Small
